title: My account is suspended, I can still login?
body: I can still login, buy RP, Visit the shop, look at my profile, Buy skins and champs etc etc. is this normal?

replies.body: I just received an email about my account being banned. I was able to log into the website and check account info no problem and there was no mention of the account being banned. as its been a few months (6+) my game client needs to update before i can see if i can actually log into it and do anything

It depends on the suspension, I believe.  A temporary suspension by the [Instant Feedback System](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-) will allow you to login, but you cannot queue for any matches.  Hope that helps clear things up!
